p: Inconsistency in the estimated size of effect of pregnancy on severity of outcomes following A(H1N1) pdm09 infection may also reflect a marked variation in the prevalence of underlying co-morbidities and residual confounding; not all reports adjusted for presence of co-morbidities in the same way. [11]â€“ [15] It is possible that differences in the ethnic composition of the populations considered may also have a role to play.
